keyMoments.title: Garp's Internal Conflict Intensifies
keyMoments.description: Garp behaves strangely as he watches Luffy advance, torn between his duty as a Marine and his love for his grandson, which Sengoku notices with concern.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the depth of Garp's emotional turmoil during the war, caught between family and duty.

keyMoments.title: Garp Punches Marco
keyMoments.description: Garp delivers a devastating Haki-infused punch to Marco, preventing him from reaching the execution platform.
keyMoments.significance: Garp actively defends the execution platform, demonstrating his incredible power and his choice to uphold Marine duty.

keyMoments.title: Garp Declares His Stance
keyMoments.description: Garp publicly declares that anyone wanting to pass must kill him first, committing fully to defending the execution platform.
keyMoments.significance: A defining moment where Garp chooses duty over family in the most painful way possible.
keyMoments.quote: If you want to pass, you'll have to kill me first!

reveals.information: Garp chooses to actively defend Ace's execution platform despite his love for Luffy and Ace

name.japanese: エドワード・ニューゲート

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Commands Pirates
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard commands his pirates to clear the way as he prepares a powerful shockwave attack.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Whitebeard's battlefield command and devastating power.

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Admires Luffy
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard expresses that he likes people like Luffy, acknowledging his determination.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Whitebeard's respect for Luffy as a worthy ally.

keyMoments.title: Clash with Akainu
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard engages in an intense battle with Admiral Akainu, showcasing massive destructive power.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most significant clashes in the war between the world's strongest man and a top Admiral.

reveals.information: Whitebeard respects and acknowledges Luffy's determination to save Ace

keyMoments.title: Ice Ball Technique Debut
keyMoments.description: Aokiji debuts his Ice Ball technique attempting to freeze Whitebeard, but fails due to Whitebeard's vibrations.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of this freezing technique, while demonstrating the limitations against certain Devil Fruit powers.

keyMoments.title: Impaled by Whitebeard
keyMoments.description: Aokiji is impaled by Whitebeard while attempting to freeze him at point-blank range, but is saved by Jozu shattering his ice form.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the extreme risks Aokiji takes in battle and his willingness to sacrifice himself.

abilities.description: Aokiji throws an ice ball that freezes opponents on contact, though it cannot freeze Whitebeard's vibrations.

keyMoments.title: Thanks Little Oars Jr.
keyMoments.description: Marco expresses gratitude to Little Oars Jr. for creating a path for the pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Marco's appreciation for his allies' sacrifices.

keyMoments.title: Punched by Garp
keyMoments.description: Marco flies toward the execution platform but is punched away by Garp's Haki-infused attack.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that even Marco's powerful Phoenix abilities can be overcome by Garp's Haki.

keyMoments.title: Blasted by Kizaru
keyMoments.description: Luffy is severely injured by Kizaru's light beam attacks while in an exhausted state.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's deteriorating condition as he pushes forward to save Ace.

keyMoments.title: Earns Whitebeard's Respect
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard expresses admiration for Luffy's determination and character.
keyMoments.significance: Luffy gains the respect of one of the world's most legendary pirates.

reveals.information: Luffy's strength is nearly exhausted from the prolonged battle at Marineford

keyMoments.title: Shatters Aokiji
keyMoments.description: Jozu intervenes and shatters Aokiji's ice body to prevent him from freezing Whitebeard at point-blank range.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Jozu's crucial role in protecting Whitebeard from the Admirals.

name.japanese: エンポリオ・イワンコフ

keyMoments.title: Panics About Luffy
keyMoments.description: Ivankov tries to hear what's happening and panics about Luffy's condition, blaming Jinbe.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the concern of Luffy's allies as his situation becomes dire.

keyMoments.title: Receives Thanks from Marco
keyMoments.description: Marco thanks Little Oars Jr. for his help in creating a path for the Whitebeard Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Acknowledges Little Oars Jr.'s sacrifice and contribution despite severe injuries.
